author: Willy
content: I hope they are insured. Many a boater on YouTube that have lost the boat and become homeless with no insurance.

author: Linda Collison
content: Good work U.S. Coast Guard and good work mariners, in being prepared.

author: Allan S
content:
A job well done, USCG. Well done indeed.

This inspired me to check on my own ERPB. Expired. I’m sure it works but am going to figure out a way to sent it stateside soon. All my other safety gear is aok.
